author: Modgames42
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

Hello, please make powershell for linux mips and mipsel, what is it for? so that you can install powershell on a router with entware and execute ps1 scripts (most routers mainly use the mips or mipsel processor architecture and less often arm or arm64)

### Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

_No response_

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: PowerShell is based on .Net Runtime. Today it doesn't support MIPS. Tracking issue https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/4234

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as answered and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: powershell for mips and mipsel
